aboutSection.title: Who are we?
aboutSection.p1: Serendipia is a multidisciplinary duo that, in their artistic pursuit, develops a unique movement aesthetic. The diversity of dance styles and acrobatics involved results in an unconventional creation that expresses their innovative personality.
aboutSection.p2: It was created in 2020, combining the different paths of Diana Sauval and José Figueroa. Since then, they have performed numerous times in various locations across Argentina.
aboutSection.p3: They have worked at Flavio Mendoza's “Circo del Anima” and performed in various shows for the Runa Asociación Civil, and have been featured in different municipalities in Buenos Aires: Malvinas Argentinas, Sierra de la Ventana, Pringles, Morón, 3 de Febrero, and Pilar.
aboutSection.p4: They were hired for shows by the Phaway Company at the National Student Festival in Jujuy, the Provincial Tourism Festival in La Rioja, the Garden Festival in Villa La Angostura in Neuquén, and the Mega Children's Day Fiesta in Santa Fe.
aboutSection.p5: Furthermore, they have been invited with their wheel cyr duo and acrobatics duo acts to the MICA (Mercado de Industrias Culturales Argentinas) Variete and the “Circo el Andén 2023” festival in Zapala, Neuquén, and the Payasadas 2023 Festival in Rosario, Buenos Aires.
